member.name: M:ARS.Rebase.computeCalibrationMatrix
member.summary: Compute the transform matrix and the inverse transform matrix using the Real-World reference and Virtual-world reference.

member.name: M:ARS.Rebase.compute(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Compute the transformation of a point from real-world coordinate system to virtual-world coordinate system.
member.param: The point in real-world space coordinate system
member.returns: The point in virtual-world space coordinate system.

member.name: M:ARS.Rebase.computeOrientation(UnityEngine.Quaternion)
member.summary: Compute the quaternion of a point from real-world coordinate system to virtual-world coordinate system.
member.param: The rotation in real-world space coordinate system
member.returns: The rotation in virtual-world space coordinate system.
